basics.name: Alexander Common
basics.label: IT & Software Solutions
basics.summary: An information technology professional with 14 years of experience, specializing in process improvement, documentation, requirements gathering & analysis, and automation.

work.name: GM / Onstar
work.summary: Primary responsibilities include upgrading and maintaining the OnStar billing systems. Also, researching potential improvements, creating and maintaining documentation, and corporate compliance. Worked in a close-knit team oriented environment. Delivering objects under tight deadlines in fast-paced, client-oriented environment
highlights: Designed and implemented HTML invoice templates for the Middle East
Converted old MS Word invoices into HTML & Liquid
Co-implemented tax reporting workflow for Mexico
Implemented SSH key authentication to improve security
Implemented database encryption to protect consumer information
Implemented and improved workflow error reporting procedure

work.name: Computer Science Corporation - Pratt & Whitney, and Sikorsky
work.summary: Primary responsibilities included upgrading and maintaining the Solumina manufacturing execution system
highlights: Automated SQL patching, freeing developers to focus on other tasks
Solved a number of problems previously thought unsolvable, including developing methods to change user input screens on-the-fly and overcoming out-of-the-box limitations
Discovered, implemented and maintained solution to display webpages within manufacturing program

work.name: University of Michigan - Flint

volunteer.summary: Interact with visitors, answer any questions about the shelter and adoption, and ensure cats and visitors get along. Other tasks include cleaning up and opening the shelter if necessary, as well as occasional visitor check-in and cash register duties
